title: When I Behold the Lord

tokens.lyric: When I behold the Lord of all, my old self dies away.

lines.raw: [E]When I behold the Lord of all, my old self dies away.

tokens.lyric: So dies the world of sinfulness giving birth to good.

lines.raw: [B7]So dies the world of sinfulness giving birth to good.

tokens.lyric: Soon a new self emerges, clear and bright and pure;

lines.raw: [C#m]Soon a new self emerges, clear and bright and pure;

tokens.lyric: Come and behold the new life, heaven and earth reborn.

lines.raw: [F#m]Come and behold the new life, heaven and earth reborn.

tokens.lyric: Now I behold Jerusalem, city of loveliness,

lines.raw: [E]Now I behold Jerusalem, city of loveliness,

tokens.lyric: Gently descending from above, ever to be my own.

lines.raw: [B7]Gently descending from above, ever to be my own.

tokens.lyric: Joy never ending is with me, long as the Lord is near;

lines.raw: [A]Joy never ending is with me, long as the Lord is near;

tokens.lyric: Joy ever flows in sweetness, river of precious life.

lines.raw: [E]Joy ever flows in sweetness, river of precious life.

tokens.lyric: Kingdom of God eternal fervently I desired;

lines.raw: [B7]Kingdom of God eternal fervently I desired;

tokens.lyric: Heavenly rays so softy fall, shining the Sun of Grace.

lines.raw: [E]Heavenly rays so softy fall, shining the Sun of Grace.

tokens.lyric: Springing forth in ripeness, fruit of the Tree of Life,

lines.raw: [C#m]Springing forth in ripeness, fruit of the Tree of Life,

tokens.lyric: Torment of doubt is over, gone is the shadow of death.

lines.raw: [F#m]Torment of doubt is over, gone is the shadow of death.

tokens.lyric: Torturing every part of me, sinfulness rules my soul.

lines.raw: [B7]Torturing every part of me, sinfulness rules my soul.

tokens.lyric: Still God can raise me purified, giving creation to me.

lines.raw: [E]Still God can raise me purified, giving creation to me.

tokens.lyric: Letting me live in his palace, shining with golden light;

lines.raw: [A]Letting me live in his palace, shining with golden light;

tokens.lyric: Boundless His love and kindness, boundless His love for me!

lines.raw: [E]Boundless His love and kindness, boundless His love for me!
